This is a list of changes between the released versions of Lua BitOp. The current release is Lua BitOp 1.0.1.

Please check the » Online Change History to see whether newer versions are available.

Lua BitOp 1.0.1 — 2009-01-06

  • Added bit.tohex for portable conversion of results to hexadecimal strings.
  • Added missing LUA_LIB define.
  • Self-tests checks for arithmetic right-shift semantics.

Lua BitOp 1.0.0 — 2008-12-17

  • Initial public release.
